valr

Sort a tbl of intervals.

Multiple sorting parameters can be combined. note that by_chrom sorts within a chrom, not by chrom.

bed_sort(x, by_size = FALSE, by_chrom = FALSE, reverse = FALSE)

Arguments

x

tbl of intervals
by_size

sort by interval size
by_chrom

sort within chromosome
reverse

reverse sort order

Details

Sorting strips groups from the input.

Deprecated function

bed_sort has been deprecated. Instead use dplyr::arrange(). See sorting for details.

See also

http://bedtools.readthedocs.org/en/latest/content/tools/sort.html

Examples

x <- trbl_interval(
   ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
   "chr8", 500, 1000,
   "chr8", 1000, 5000,
   "chr8", 100, 200,
   "chr1", 100, 300,
   "chr1", 100, 200
)

# sort by chrom and start
bed_sort(x)
#> Warning: bed_sort() is deprecated. see examples in `?sorting`.
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr1   100   300
#> 2  chr1   100   200
#> 3  chr8   100   200
#> 4  chr8   500  1000
#> 5  chr8  1000  5000

# reverse sort order
bed_sort(x, reverse = TRUE)
#> Warning: bed_sort() is deprecated. see examples in `?sorting`.
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr1   100   300
#> 2  chr1   100   200
#> 3  chr8  1000  5000
#> 4  chr8   500  1000
#> 5  chr8   100   200

# sort by interval size
bed_sort(x, by_size = TRUE)
#> Warning: bed_sort() is deprecated. see examples in `?sorting`.
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr8   100   200
#> 2  chr1   100   200
#> 3  chr1   100   300
#> 4  chr8   500  1000
#> 5  chr8  1000  5000

# sort by decreasing interval size
bed_sort(x, by_size = TRUE, reverse = TRUE)
#> Warning: bed_sort() is deprecated. see examples in `?sorting`.
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr8  1000  5000
#> 2  chr8   500  1000
#> 3  chr1   100   300
#> 4  chr8   100   200
#> 5  chr1   100   200

# sort by interval size within chrom
bed_sort(x, by_size = TRUE, by_chrom = TRUE)
#> Warning: bed_sort() is deprecated. see examples in `?sorting`.
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#> # Groups:   chrom [2]
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr8   100   200
#> 2  chr1   100   200
#> 3  chr1   100   300
#> 4  chr8   500  1000
#> 5  chr8  1000  5000
